page.title: 18TOURIST INDUSTRY
page.content: After farming the most important work in Arkengartdale is providing for the {tourists.}Some come to walk amidst the beautiful{scenery;}many come especially to visit{Langthwaite,}where much of the{James Herriot}T.V.series was filmed. Previously Walt Disney made use of the picturesque,old world setting when he filmed{'Escape from {the Dark'.}More recently{'A Woman of {Substance'}was filmed in{Langthwaite and{Arkle Town.}Many tourists come armed with 'hunt the location' literature and stay for{bed and {breakfast}or in one of the{holiday {cottages.}Many fall in love with the dale's unspoilt natural surroundings and return to visit the dale year after year.
